properties.entry: SELECT MANAGER_NO , MANAGER_ID , MANAGER_PWD FROM TB_MANAGER_ID WHERE MANAGER_ID = ? AND MANAGER_PWD = ?
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_TEL , NICKNAME FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_TEL , NICKNAME FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? , MEM_TEL = ? , NICKNAME = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
